summary: Meshes modified with BodySlide 2/Outfit Studio to add TBBP.
descriptionHtml:
Please see original mod for full requirements and installation instructions. You do not need to download/install original mod since I have repackaged it with the TBBP-enabled meshes. If you have original Ashara's Imperial Outfit already installed, I have also provided just the TBBP-enabled meshes as an optional download.

Update:
1.3 Dress0 if you have issues with missing breast/butt bones on 0 weight short dress. Also, optional version for Dress1 to match.

1.2 version switched to long skirt/no leg version and fixed some movement issues with long skirt. Please download 1.2 update to replace long skirt meshes and fix neck seams

Original Mod and Credit to
Ashara's Imperial outfit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51682/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51682/?[/url]

Permissions
Please credit Ashara/SydneyB if you distribute any part of mod. If you want to reuse the body credit Brokefoot, Kurese and Dimon, too, and send a PM to Brokefoot before uploading your mod.

For TBBP to work properly, you also need TBBP animations or HDT and
XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?[/url]

Credit to
Ashara/SydneyB for Ashara's Imperial Outfit
Brokefoot, Kurese and Dimon for their work on UNP body.

BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio
Caliente.
Ousnius.
ChronoTrigger77.
stuffed_bunny.

Hope I gave enough credit, if not, please let me know.
author: pringles89
